Uses of Interface
org.apache.freemarker.core.model.TemplateHashModel

  • Packages that use TemplateHashModel 
    Package Description
    org.apache.freemarker.core
    The most commonly used API-s of FreeMarker; start with Configuration (see also the Getting Stared in the Manual.)
    org.apache.freemarker.core.model
    Data model and template language type system: Base classes/interfaces.
    org.apache.freemarker.core.model.impl
    Data model and template language type system: Standard implementations.
    org.apache.freemarker.dom
    Exposes DOM XML nodes to templates as easily traversable trees; see in the Manual.
    org.apache.freemarker.servlet
    Servlet for legacy "Model 2" frameworks that allows using FreeMarker templates instead of JSP as the MVC View (see in the Manual), also custom JSP tag support.
    org.apache.freemarker.servlet.jsp
    Allows JSP custom tags to be used inside FreeMarker templates as if they where FreeMarker directives.
    org.apache.freemarker.spring.model
    FreeMarker Directives and Functions Support for Spring Framework MVC
    org.apache.freemarker.spring.web.view
    Spring Framework MVC View Support

    • Uses of TemplateHashModel in org.apache.freemarker.core.model

      Subinterfaces of TemplateHashModel in org.apache.freemarker.core.model 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  TemplateHashModelEx
      "extended hash" template language data type; extends TemplateHashModel by allowing iterating through its keys and values.
      interface  TemplateHashModelEx2
      Adds key-value pair listing capability to TemplateHashModelEx.
      Methods in org.apache.freemarker.core.model that return TemplateHashModel 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TemplateHashModel ObjectWrapperWithAPISupport.wrapAsAPI(Object obj)
      Wraps an object to a TemplateModel that exposes the object's "native" (usually, Java) API.

    • Uses of TemplateHashModel in org.apache.freemarker.core.model.impl

      Classes in org.apache.freemarker.core.model.impl that implement TemplateHashModel 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BeanAndStringModel
      Subclass of BeanModel that exposes the return value of the Object.toString() method through the TemplateStringModel interface.
      class  BeanModel
      A class that will wrap an arbitrary object into TemplateHashModel interface allowing calls to arbitrary property getters and invocation of accessible methods on the object from a template using the object.foo to access properties and object.bar(arg1, arg2) to invoke methods on it.
      class  DefaultMapAdapter
      Adapts a Map to the corresponding TemplateModel interface(s), most importantly to TemplateHashModelEx.
      class  ResourceBundleModel
      A hash model that wraps a resource bundle.
      class  SimpleHash
      A simple implementation of the TemplateHashModelEx interface, using its own underlying Map or SortedMap for storing the hash entries.
      Methods in org.apache.freemarker.core.model.impl that return TemplateHashModel 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TemplateHashModel DefaultObjectWrapper.getEnumModels()
      Returns a hash model that represents the so-called class enum models.
      TemplateHashModel DefaultObjectWrapper.getStaticModels()
      Returns a hash model that represents the so-called class static models.
      TemplateHashModel DefaultObjectWrapper.wrapAsAPI(Object obj) 
      TemplateHashModel RestrictedObjectWrapper.wrapAsAPI(Object obj)

      A base class for wrapping a single W3C DOM_WRAPPER Node as a FreeMarker template model.

    • Uses of TemplateHashModel in org.apache.freemarker.servlet

      Classes in org.apache.freemarker.servlet that implement TemplateHashModel 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AllHttpScopesHashModel
      An extension of SimpleHash that looks up keys in the hash, then in the request, session, and servlet context scopes.
      class  HttpRequestHashModel
      TemplateHashModel wrapper for a HttpServletRequest attributes.
      class  HttpRequestParametersHashModel
      TemplateHashModel wrapper for a HttpServletRequest parameters.
      class  HttpSessionHashModel
      TemplateHashModel wrapper for a HttpSession attributes.
      class  ServletContextHashModel
      TemplateHashModel wrapper for a ServletContext attributes.

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  TaglibFactory
      A hash model associated with a servlet context that can load JSP tag libraries associated with that servlet context.

      TemplateHashModel wrapper for templates using Spring directives, functions and internal models.
